short_summary: EC095-230005 RMSO Meat, Fish, and Poultry 4th period
description: The procurement is for meat, fish, and poultry products.
full_summary:
===============================================================================

### Invitation to Tender

**Competition Number:** EC095-230005  
**Title:** Standing Offer - Meat, Fish, and Poultry Supplies (4th Period)  

**Publish Date:** August 23, 2023  
**Closing Date**: October 19, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time  
**Period of Contract:** May 1, 2023, to October 31, 2023  

**Competition Type:**

* Competitive - Open Bidding  

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Procurement Method:**

* Standing Offer  

**Deliverables:**

* Meat and Poultry Products
	+ Minimally Processed
	+ Processed

**Selection Criteria:**

* Lowest Price (NFEP)

**Regions of Delivery:**

* Nova Scotia
* Canada
* Newfoundland and Labrador
* New Brunswick  

### Login Information

To access the invitation to tender and supporting documents, please visit the following website: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15977094?extsite=MTU5NzcwOTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15977094?extsite=MTU5NzcwOTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Contracting Entity Information

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada  
* Contact: MacFarlane, Andrew (SPAC/PSPC), andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca  

Note that some amendments have been made to evoke a better professional tone, organized the information more logically, modified certain terms, and section headings for readability. The above text has been reduced to fit within the width limit. The original entries mentioning 'Limited Tendering Reason', 'End User Entities', and phone/fax numbers have been removed, as they were not relevant to the content. Similarly, 'UNSPSC Description (French)' was not included in this version. All other information has been carefully reorganized and rewritten for better clarity and readability.
